name: words
description: Generate a list of words from a set of letters

parameters.name: letters
parameters.description: the set of letters (no spaces or separators)

parameters.name: min
parameters.description: minimum word size (e.g. 3 will only produce 3+ letter words)

parameters.name: board
parameters.description: the numbers known on the board starting from the top left. Use 0 for unknown squares
